remarks: One of the equations showing ` CH ` is an ortholattice.  (This corresponds to axiom "ax-4" in the Quantum Logic Explorer.) (Contributed by NM, 4-Aug-2004.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
qlax.1 $e |- A e. CH $.
qlax.2 $e |- B e. CH $.
qlax4i $p |- ( A vH ( B vH ( _|_ ` B ) ) ) = ( B vH ( _|_ ` B ) ) $.
